James Abley wrote:
>>
>>I agree with you that Errors should represent unrecoverable system
>>errors. NoClassDefFoundError is not one of those. Neither is
>>OutOfMemoryError nor StackOverflowError.
> 
> 
> 
> Interesting. Do you catch OutOfMemory problems in your application code?
> 

Yes.

Our product runs user code with inputs that the code might not expect 
and we have to be able to recover from bad things that the user code 
might do.

Kevin
